thread.title: OMG! Watch the sweet video of a Nigerian lady who packed her bags and relocated abroad
thread.title_full: OMG! Watch the sweet video of a Nigerian lady who packed her bags and relocated abroad

author: Basit Jamiu
title: OMG! Watch the sweet video of a Nigerian lady who packed her bags and relocated abroad
text: “I'm Saving This Sound”: Nigerian Lady Packs Her Bags, Relocates Abroad, Shares Her Excitement - A Nigerian lady’s journey from her homeland to an overseas destination has captured the interest of the online community after she shared a video expressing her delight - The clip showed her preparations for the move, capturing moments of her at the airport, poised for the life-changing relocation - Upon arrival, her excitement is palpable as she embraces the new environment, sharing her initial experiences of the foreign country with an infectious enthusiasm A Nigerian lady who had moved overseas captured the internet’s attention as she shared her exhilaration. Clip depicted her making preparations for the move, including a journey to the airport. Upon reaching her new country, [she radiated joy](https://www.tiktok.com/@sophie_diamond1/), immersing herself in the first impressions of the unfamiliar land,as shown by [@sophie_diamond1](https://www.tiktok.com/@sophie_diamond1/). Watch the video below: PAY ATTENTION: Share your outstanding story with our editors! Please reach us through info@corp.legit.ng! Legit.ng compiled some of the reactions below: BoredGirl said: “I'm saving this sound, so I can use it before this year runs out in Jesus name.” Dolly wrote: “I remember the day lI was leaving home my mom cry so much and die after1 year.” Unshakable commented: “Is like everyone dey japa ooo.” Akinola Abiola also commented: “Congratulations 5s, l've been coming across japa videos since is dis a sign lord.” Tunchi Dior also commented: “Which country did u travel to please.” Roli: “The fact she didn't use filter is the best part.” Lam_äwëlëg: “Congratulations. I won't stop congratulating others till l use this sound.” AshaBiade: “Please anyone that can take me travel abeg I want work oo.” Mustunde: “You go press tire.” Vanessa: “I will be next amen.” Lady speaks two months after relocating Meanwhile, Legit.ng earlier reported that a few months ago, a brave Nigerian lady [decided to leave ](https://www.legit.ng/people/1571937-stop-discouraging-people-uk-sweet-nigerian-lady-relocates-months-speaks/)her home country and embark on a journey to the UK, where she hoped to find better opportunities and a new life. She had always dreamt of living in the UK, but she faced many challenges and doubts from others who did not share her vision. She shared her honest experience of living in the UK and how she overcame the obstacles and fears that others had projected on her decision. PAY ATTENTION: [Unlock the best of Legit.ng on Pinterest! Subscribe now and get your daily inspiration!](https://www.pinterest.com/Legitng/) Source: Legit.ng
